string.name: cat_bottomsheet_textfield_label
string.description: The label for the bottom sheet text field. [CHAR_LIMIT=100]

Secondary line text Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, nec no nominavi scaevola. Per et sint sapientem, nobis perpetua salutandi mei te.
Carousels are stylized versions of lists that provide a unique viewing and behavior that suit large imagery and other visually rich content.

string.name: cat_carousel_hero_demo_title
string.description: Name of the hero variant demo. [CHAR_LIMIT=NONE]

string.name: cat_carousel_uncontained_demo_title
string.description: Name of the uncontained variant demo. [CHAR_LIMIT=NONE]

resources.string: Multi-browse carousels allow quick browsing of many small items, like a photo thumbnail gallery.

string.name: cat_carousel_hero_title
string.description: Title of the hero variant demo. [CHAR_LIMIT=NONE]

string.name: cat_carousel_hero_desc
string.description: Description of the hero variant demo.[CHAR_LIMIT=NONE]

resources.string: Hero carousels allow browsing with a focus on one main item at a time.

string.name: cat_carousel_fullscreen_title
string.description: Title of the fullscreen variant demo. [CHAR_LIMIT=NONE]

string.name: cat_carousel_fullscreen_desc
string.description: Title of the fullscreen variant demo. [CHAR_LIMIT=NONE]

resources.string: Fullscreen carousels allow browsing with a focus on one item at a time.

string.name: cat_carousel_uncontained_title
string.description: Title of the uncontained variant demo. [CHAR_LIMIT=NONE]

string.name: cat_carousel_uncontained_desc
string.description: Title of the uncontained variant demo. [CHAR_LIMIT=NONE]

resources.string: Uncontained carousels show items at their original sizes, with items getting smaller as they reach the edges of the screen and are cut off in the direction they scroll.
Portrait of a person with hair covering their face
A person hiking wearing a backpack
Three mushrooms growing on a log

string.name: cat_carousel_enable_snap_label
string.description: The title of a switch to enable snapping to carousel items.[CHAR_LIMIT=NONE]

string.name: cat_carousel_enable_fling_label
string.description: The title of a switch to enable the flinging gesture.[CHAR_LIMIT=NONE]

string.name: cat_carousel_start_align_label
string.description: The title of a button to make the carousel start-aligned.[CHAR_LIMIT=NONE]

string.name: cat_carousel_center_align_label
string.description: The title of a button to make the carousel center-aligned.[CHAR_LIMIT=NONE]

string.name: cat_carousel_show_debug_options
string.description: The title of the button that shows carousel debug options.[CHAR_LIMIT=NONE]

string.name: cat_carousel_snap_switch_description
string.description: Content description of a switch to enable snapping.[CHAR_LIMIT=NONE]

resources.string: The CheckBox provides a selectable element, usually part of a list, that toggles between two states.
CheckBox elements that are disabled cannot be interacted with and will appear faded.
Check this checkbox to control the enabled state of the boxes below.
The checkboxes below have a parent/child relationship. The parent\'s state depends on the state of the children.
Below is a checkbox with no text.
Check this checkbox to control the error state of all checkboxes in this page.
